00012 #define SAFETY_ON_NULL_RETURN(exp) \
00013     do { \
00014         if (exp == NULL) { \
00015             GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGER, "%s:%d\tSafety check Error. %s == NULL", __FILE__, __LINE__, #exp); \
00016             return; \
00017         } \
00018     } while (0)

00020 #undef SAFETY_ON_NULL_RETURN_VAL
00021 #define SAFETY_ON_NULL_RETURN_VAL(exp, val) \
00022     do { \
00023         if (exp == NULL) { \
00024             GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGER, "%s:%d\tSafety check Error. %s == NULL", __FILE__, __LINE__, #exp); \
00025             return val; \
00026         } \
00027     } while (0)
